attributes.action: Ensure the 2012 London Olympic games are carbon negative (including all travel of spectators, employees and participants)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use the Olympic games as a catalyst for the way major global events are managed. This petition is to understand the carbon footprint of the Olympic games including; building work, travel of spectators, employees and participants, energy usage and waste. This should be more than offset by carbon reduction activities.
